Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can depict a problem where people need to communicate over long distances.
The student can illustrate a device that uses sound to solve the communication problem.
The student can show how the device sends and receives messages using string cups.
The student can draw the materials clearly, such as string and cups, to construct the device.
The student can demonstrate that the device functions over a distance between two people.
The student can explain through their drawing how using such a device makes communication easier over distances.
